resources.string: Plugin for recording uncompressed high-quality audio, utilizing low-level classes to directly interact with hardware, with capabilities for playback and audio input device selection.
Cannot process request, the plugin status is not CONNECTED. Please try reconnecting the plugin.
Please decide how you would like to proceed
What action do you wish to perform? \nYour options are to playback the recorded audio, send it directly, or discard it
Cannot start player. Audio file does not exists
Cannot read audio file. There will be no effect on pressing buttons
Are you sure you want to exit?
If you click Yes, you won\'t be able to send the most recent recorded audio
Please stop the ongoing recording before exiting this activity.
